title: Ravelli Tripods ATW Mini Tripod for Digital Camera or Webcam
description: The Ravelli Tripods mini tripod is great when you need a very compact or portable mount for your digital camera or webcam.  The head is approximately 1" long with a universal camera/webcam screw mount on top and an integrated clip to attach to a belt on the side.  It has three flexible wire legs, each approximately 4" long.  At the end of each leg is a non-scratch plastic ball.  The three flexible legs can be bent in any direction allowing you to mount on unusual or uneven surfaces.
